The Belpre City School District will hold its regular monthly meeting of the Belpre City School District Board of Education on Monday, April 20, 2020, beginning at 5:00 p.m. at the Stone Administration/Early Learning Center. Due to
COVID-19, physical attendance by the public is prohibited. Members of the public can attend the meeting virtually via the following link https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HP418tuqABo

Gov. DeWine has indicated that he will be announcing early next week whether we will be back in school or not. We have had a lot of questions about Prom. Prom has already been postponed with an alternative date of May 16, 2020 if we are permitted to hold it. We will continue to make announcements as we can.
